citation.article-title: Spirochaeta dissipatitropha sp. nov., an alkaliphilic, obligately anaerobic bacterium, and emended description of the genus Spirochaeta Ehrenberg 1835
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Spirochaeta Ehrenberg 1835
The description of the genus is as that given by Canale-Parola (1984), with the following modifications.
Some species are able to grow without sugars by using, as alternative substrates, some amino acids and/or proteolysis products, such as yeast extract, peptone and Casamino acids.
Genomic DNA G+C content is 44–65 mol%.
